modName: Heavy armor skill to unarmed damage
summary: Adds 1/2 of your heavy armor skill straight to unarmed damage.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 1/2 of your heavy armor skill straight to unarmed damage with the fists of steel perk. Really simple mod, but I felt unarmed combat was excessively under-powered and couldn\'t find any mods that just made your unarmed damage better without adding in fake one handed weapons.

Original Steam Workshop version can be found here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10312

I recommend just using the steam version but a user requested I add it to the nexus as well.
author: SlushpuppieT
